visualization module

class visualization.imu_viewer(width, height, hz)[source]

Bases: object

display(acc, gyr, mag, euler, quaternion, body, nav)[source]

Display IMU information and visualize the IMU model

Parameters:

  • acc (ndarray) – accelerometer data

  • gyr (ndarray) – gyroscope data

  • mag (ndarray) – magnetometer data

  • euler (ndarray) – euler angle

  • quaternion (ndarray) – quaternion

  • body (str) – body frame

  • nav (str) – navigation frame

message_display(text, x, y, text_color)[source]

Display the color message in the window

Parameters:

  • text (str) – display text

  • x (int) – x-axis pixel

  • y (int) – y-axis pixel

  • text_color (tuple) – rgb color

project2window(x, y, scaling_constant)[source]

Project position into window coordinates pixel

Parameters:

  • x (int) – x-axis position

  • y (int) – y-axis position

  • scaling_constant (int) – scale up or down the point

Returns:

  • window_x - sensor value in int16 format

  • window_y - sensor value in int16 format

run(imu)[source]

Create IMU wireframe and keep display IMU information until it close

Parameters:

imu (IMU) – imu object
